name: User shares journey - no corporate thanks
description: Real failure: Agent said 'Thanks for sharing your journey'

trigger.subject: Re: A quick question...
trigger.body:
Hey Matt,

I've been experimenting with agentic coding for the past few months. The concept of 'backpressure' as a quality constraint is really interesting. I'm thinking about how to maintain code standards while using AI assistance.

Would love to hear your thoughts on this approach.
